data.text: @RepJohnCurtis It is time for Russia, which has no role in world peace, to be expelled from the Security Council, as the Security Council has become an instrument in the hands of the Kremlin dictator for its nefarious purposes. Choose Germany or Japan as a permanent member.
@RepJohnCurtis Not to make light, but perhaps supporting conscientious application of proven methods to mitigate disease (vaccinations, masks, etc) would have helped

@RepJohnCurtis Will this include securing funding, or is that only for private schools in Park City? Or you could stand up for teachers by denouncing the absurd critical race theory outrage your colleagues are using as a wedge issue for the midterms.
@koletrain2 @RepJohnCurtis Ehh.. Biden has a D and is going the same direction, no?

@koletrain2 @jmhulet @RepJohnCurtis Guess you missed all the town halls that @RepJohnCurtis ran over the past couple of years. I didn't. He handled zingers   from both sides with diplomacy and grace. Keep it up John!

@RepJohnCurtis Republicans have done more to keep masks out of schools than guns
#Covididiots https://t.co/RIVdmw29Ui

@RepJohnCurtis So -  you met with Principals, 
what about the TEACHERS?

My wife and son are both teachers.
Master's Degrees

sh*tty pay
COVID
State legislature HATES them, passes bills to punish them, spy on them, and sue them.

I told them to both QUIT and get the hell out of there !!!
@RepJohnCurtis Now do it again in Utah County and open it up. Townhalls are where it's at.
